column4: can someone tell me something? how do i.. install a RPM package?
what are you trying to install?
search Synaptic for a program called Alien
what version of Linux are you using?
i'm using kubuntu, whatever newest version that i downloaded 1 week ago.
well, that doesn't mean you're using the newest version, did you download 6.06, or 6.10?... they are both still regularly hosted
it's saying something along "unable to lock administration directory" ?
download the RPM to your desktop
i have no idea how to do it via CD
now i copied rpm files to desktop, can i install them now?
